title: Did Trump Hide Nuclear Codes in Melaniaâ€™s Unmentionables? | Guests: Tom Fitton & Herschel Walker | 8/12/22
description:
Glenn and Stu discuss the latest details regarding the FBI's raid on former President Donald Trump, as the FBI finally came out with its reasoning for it. Glenn gives his theory on what's going on with Trump and his family. Judicial Watch President Tom Fitton highlights the DOJ's unprecedented policy changes to justify the raid. Bill O'Reilly joins for his weekly news recap, giving his take on the FBI, its raid on Trump, and its corruption. Author Michael Malice joins to give his anarchist's take on the FBI's raid on Trump's home. Senate candidate Herschel Walker joins to discuss how crucial a red wave is for the upcoming midterms in the wake of the FBI Trump raid. Glenn and Stu discuss the Left's latest attempt to normalize pedophilia.
